scripts.copy-static: cpx "src/static/icon.png" dist/ && cpx "src/static/chat-background.jpg" dist/ && cpx "src/manifest.json" dist/ && cpx "src/index.html" dist/ && cpx "src/options.html" dist/ && cpx "src/css/output-styles.css" dist/css
scripts.build:js: parcel build ./src/js/ui-page/main.js --dist-dir dist/js --no-optimize --no-scope-hoist && parcel build ./src/js/options-page/options.js --dist-dir dist/js --no-optimize --no-scope-hoist && parcel build ./src/js/content.js --dist-dir dist/js --no-optimize --no-scope-hoist && rollup -c rollup.config.mjs
scripts.start: npm run style && parcel src/index.html --dist-dir dist
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run style && npm run copy-static && npm run copy-js && npm run build:js
